statements: UPDATE employee_activity SET employee_name = 'John Doe', login_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', logout_time = '2022-01-01 17:00:00', activity_description = 'Worked on project A' WHERE employee_id = 101;

UPDATE employee_activity SET activity_description = 'Attended team meeting', logout_time = '2022-01-02 12:00:00', login_time = '2022-01-02 09:00:00', employee_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE employee_id = 102;
UPDATE employee_activity SET employee_name = 'John Doe', login_time = '2023-05-10 08:30:00', activity_description = 'Morning Shift' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee_activity SET activity_description = 'Afternoon Shift', logout_time = '2023-05-10 17:00:00', employee_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE employee_id = 102;
UPDATE employee_activity SET activity_description='Working on a project' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE employee_locations SET location_name='Headquarters' WHERE location_id=1;
UPDATE employee_locations SET location_name = 'Office' WHERE employee_id = 123;
UPDATE employee_activity SET activity_description = 'Meeting with clients' WHERE employee_id = 456 AND activity_type = 'Meeting';
UPDATE RemoteEmployees SET department_name = 'HR' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE ActivityLogs SET activity_type = 'Login' WHERE log_id = 101;

UPDATE device_logs SET online_status=false, last_connection_time='2022-01-20 08:00:00' WHERE device_id=200
UPDATE remote_employees SET remote_access = true, logout_time = '2022-05-18 09:30:00' WHERE employee_id = 101

UPDATE employees SET department = 'Technology' WHERE employee_id = 101;
